      • makePiece

        private Pieces makePiece​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         boolean moveable,
                         boolean player1)
        Parameters:
        color - passes the color of the piece
        x - location at where the piece will be placed
        y - location at where the piece will be placed
        moveable - if its not moveable then you cannot move it.
        player1 - Tells us if it is player 1's turn or player 2.
        Returns:
        returns type Pieces (a new piece)

      • getPegColors

        private Pegs getPegColors()
        this function looks at the GameInstance class and sees how many whitepegs there are and black pegs there are.
        Returns:
        returns instance of Pegs which has the colors and location.

      • p2getPegColors

        private Pegs p2getPegColors()
        this function looks at the GameInstance class and sees how many whitepegs there are and black pegs there are. same as getPegColors but for player 2
        Returns:
        returns instance of Pegs which has the colors and location.

        Returns:
